item.title: Dashboards: A great idea, just poorly executed
item.description: Dashboards are a great idea - just poorly executed Nearly all organizations or teams have some form of dashboard that they monitor on some basis. Dashboards come in various shapes and sizes, with various audiences from engineers all the way to execute leadership, including data related to financial, project projections, user engagement or anything that an individual or team feels they need to know a regular basis.
